CustomField.formula: IF( TEXT(SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__DeliveryMethod__c) = "Delivery" , IF( Address__c = "", Account__r.ShippingStreet & ", " & IF(Account__r.Shipping_Address_Line2__c = "","",Account__r.Shipping_Address_Line2__c & ", ") & Account__r.ShippingCity & ", " & Account__r.Shipping_State_Code__c & " " & Account__r.ShippingPostalCode , Address__r.Street__c & ", " & IF( Address__r.AddressLine2__c = "","", Address__r.AddressLine2__c & ", ") & Address__r.City__c & ", " & TEXT(Address__r.StateProvinceCode__c) & " " & Address__r.ZipPostalCode__c ) , "Customer Pickup at Branch")
CustomField.label: Delivery Address
